description: The third-party GSP API is unreliable or has poor documentation, delaying the critical e-invoicing feature.
mitigation_strategy: Develop a mock GSP server in parallel to unblock development. Enforce synchronous-with-asynchronous-fallback architecture.
contingency_plan: Implement the manual IRN entry feature (US-038) as a priority to provide a business-level fallback.
monitoring_trigger: GSP sandbox is not available by Sprint 9. API error rates in testing exceed 10%.

description: Project relies on single individuals for Frontend (OWL) and DevOps (EKS/Terraform), creating bottlenecks and high risk if a resource becomes unavailable.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming on critical tasks. Enforce comprehensive documentation for all frontend components and infrastructure code.
contingency_plan: Maintain a retainer with a specialized AWS/Odoo consultancy for emergency support.
monitoring_trigger: Key documentation (e.g., deployment runbook) is not completed within one sprint of the feature.

description: The one-time data migration fails due to poor data quality in the legacy system or incorrect mapping, jeopardizing the go-live.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate at least two successful, stakeholder-validated dry-runs in staging. Develop comprehensive validation scripts early.
contingency_plan: Prepare for a phased rollout, running the new system in parallel with the old one for one billing cycle if migration confidence is low.
monitoring_trigger: First dry-run validation report shows more than 5% data mismatch.
resolution_timeline: 4 weeks for data cleansing and script refinement.
